alert.note: Alert for McDowell; Wyoming (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 7:29PM EDT until May 19 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern McDowell County in southern West Virginia... Southeastern Wyoming County in southern West Virginia... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 729 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over War, or 10 miles southwest of Welch, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Welch, Gary, Northfork, Keystone, Kimball and Herndon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
